message: Let's start with a fair split, I'll give you a good deal!
You didn't give me a good deal, now I'm taking 60%!
You wanted more, now I'll give you a chance to match!
You're still not giving me enough, I'm taking 70% now!
Let's meet in the middle, I'm willing to compromise!
You're getting desperate, I'm taking 85% now!
I'm keeping what's left, you can have the rest!
